matrix-project.description: This job builds the Common Project, which has common reusable code

hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.name: BUILD_SELECTOR_BOOST
hudson.plugins.copyartifact.BuildSelecto.description: Select the boost build to be used.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: BUILDDOWNSTREAM
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: By default will trigger the downstream iCafe or other projects, which use the Common.

scm.projectOptions: allwrite clobber nocompress unlocked nomodtime rmdir

hudson.tasks.BatchFile.command:
@echo off setlocal
REM This script extract the required boost headers and libraries. REM Note: As of now now common uses the statically linked runtime shared libraries, so we extract only that.
REM Extract the boost includes.
set THIRDPARTY_DIR=%WORKSPACE%\VDK\Common\thirdParty if NOT EXIST %THIRDPARTY_DIR% ( mkdir %THIRDPARTY_DIR% )
echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling %SEVENZ% x -aoa boost-includes-*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o%THIRDPARTY_DIR% %SEVENZ% x -aoa boost-includes-*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o%THIRDPARTY_DIR% | findstr /b /r /c:"\<Everything is Ok" /c:"\<Processing archive" if ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [ERR]Failed to extract boost-includes-*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% exit /b ERRORLEVEL )
REM Extract the boost Libraries. REM As of now only libboost_thread-vc100-mt-gd-1_57.lib;libboost_chrono-vc100-mt-gd-1_57.lib are needed echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling %SEVENZ% x -aoa boost-lib-link-static-runtime-shared-%C%-%T%-%PLATFORM_ARCH_SHORT%-*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_chrono-*.lib -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_date_time-*.lib -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_thread*.lib -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_system*.lib -o%THIRDPARTY_DIR% %SEVENZ% x -aoa boost-lib-link-static-runtime-shared-%C%-%T%-%PLATFORM_ARCH_SHORT%-*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_chrono-*.lib -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_date_time-*.lib -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_thread*.lib -i!boost_*\lib\%P%\%C%\libboost_system*.lib -o%THIRDPARTY_DIR% | findstr /b /r /c:"\<Everything is Ok" /c:"\<Processing archive" if ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [ERR]Failed to extract libboost_thread*.lib from boost-lib-link-static-runtime-shared-%C%-%T%-%PLATFORM_ARCH_AMD%-*.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% )
REM Extract the Xerces license files. set XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR=%THIRDPARTY_DIR%\xerces\%XERCES_VERSION% echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling %SEVENZ% x -aoa xerces-*-license.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR%" %SEVENZ% x -aoa xerces-*-license.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR%" | findstr /b /r /c:"\<Everything is Ok" /c:"\<Processing archive" if ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [ERR]Failed to extract xerces-*-license.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% to %XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR% exit /b ERRORLEVEL )
REM Extract the Xerces headers files. echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling %SEVENZ% x -aoa xerces-*-inc.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR%" -x!src\*.am %SEVENZ% x -aoa xerces-*-inc.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR%" -x!src\*.am | findstr /b /r /c:"\<Everything is Ok" /c:"\<Processing archive" if ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [ERR]Failed to extract xerces-*-inc.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% to %XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR% exit /b ERRORLEVEL )
REM move the src to inc folders pushd %XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR% echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]PWD: %CD% echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling move /Y src inc move /Y src inc popd
REM Extract the Xerces binaries files. set XERCES_BIN_DIR=%XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR%\bin\%P%\%T%\%C% if NOT EXIST "%XERCES_BIN_DIR%" ( mkdir "%XERCES_BIN_DIR%" ) echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling %SEVENZ% e -aoa xerces-*-bin-%C%-%P%-%T%.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_BIN_DIR%" -x!Build\%PLATFORM_ARCH_WIN%\%VCNAME_ALT%\%C%\*.lib %SEVENZ% e -aoa xerces-*-bin-%C%-%P%-%T%.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_BIN_DIR%" -x!Build\%PLATFORM_ARCH_WIN%\%VCNAME_ALT%\%C%\*.lib | findstr /b /r /c:"\<Everything is Ok" /c:"\<Processing archive" if ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [ERR]Failed to extract xerces-*-bin-%C%-%P%-%T%.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% to %XERCES_BIN_DIR% exit /b ERRORLEVEL )
REM Extract the Xerces binaries files. set XERCES_LIB_DIR=%XERCES_THIRDPARTY_DIR%\lib\%P%\%T%\%C% if NOT EXIST "%XERCES_LIB_DIR%" ( mkdir "%XERCES_LIB_DIR%" ) echo [INFO][%~n0%~x0]Calling %SEVENZ% e -aoa xerces-*-bin-%C%-%P%-%T%.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_LIB_DIR%" -i!Build\%PLATFORM_ARCH_WIN%\%VCNAME_ALT%\%C%\*.lib %SEVENZ% e -aoa xerces-*-bin-%C%-%P%-%T%.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% -o"%XERCES_LIB_DIR%" -i!Build\%PLATFORM_ARCH_WIN%\%VCNAME_ALT%\%C%\*.lib | findstr /b /r /c:"\<Everything is Ok" /c:"\<Processing archive" if ERRORLEVEL 1 ( echo [ERR]Failed to extract xerces-*-bin-%C%-%P%-%T%.%ARCHIVE_EXTENSION% to %XERCES_LIB_DIR% exit /b ERRORLEVEL )
endlocal

hudson.plugins.emailext.ExtendedEmailPub.defaultContent:
CAS Build System  |  Update preferences  |  Unsubscribe

Common Utils Build Notification

STATUS

The CAS Build System finished building the $PROJECT_NAME

Status: $BUILD_STATUS
BuildNumber: $MAJOR_NUMBER.$MINOR_NUMBER.$BUILD_NUMBER
Originator: $CAUSE
Changes: $CHANGES
Download URL: $JOB_URL
Build Console: $BUILD_URL/console

AMD | AMD Central
